title: Ryan Madson on homer he gave up to Colby Rasmus
text: Ryan Madson on homer he gave up to Colby Rasmus OCT 09, 2:05 am Royals reliever Ryan Madson discusses what went wrong in the home run he allowed to Houston's Colby Rasmus.
